entities.name: bellatrix
entities.description: Bellatrix is mentioned as a person who has just gotten married, and the Death Eaters are mocking her family's reaction to it. ("I'm talking about your niece, Bellatrix... She has just married the werewolf, Remus Lupin.")

relationships.description: Bellatrix is married to Remus Lupin, as mentioned in the text. ("She has just married the werewolf, Remus Lupin.")

Bellatrix is mentioned as a sister of Lucius. ("She is no niece of ours, my Lord," she cried over the outpouring of mirth. "We — Narcissa and I — have never set eyes on our sister since she married the Mudblood.")
